titles.title: Disclose Police Brutality Bonds Act of 2020

To amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to require issuers to disclose services performed for State and local governments in connection with the issuance of bonds that may be used to pay for settlements or judgments in connection with police violence or civil rights abuses, and for other purposes.
Disclose Police Brutality Bonds Act of 2020

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
Disclose Police Brutality Bonds Act of 2020
This bill requires issuers of securities to disclose services provided to state and local governments related to the issuance of bonds if proceeds may be used to pay settlements or judgments in connection with police violence or civil rights abuses.
